content: my last birthday beginning with digit 3 deserves a celebration next year i ll be a proper grown-up so let s celebrate today with this pretty brioche thing which i made for everyone wanting to try brioche it s so super easy you can even use your favorite co to begin the cowl just grab two skeins of bulky yarn and have fun brioching one size circumference 60cm/24 height approx 25cm/10 yarn 2 skeins of martin s lab big singles - 80% merino 20% nylon 70m/77y per 100g sample shown in colorways mc carousel cc gilbert grape 1 skein each needles 8mm/us #11 or size needed for gauge 40cm/16 circular other notions stitch marker tapestry needle for weaving gauge 9 5 sts x 13 rounds over 10cm/4 in unstretched brioche stitch worked in the round with needle 8mm/us #11
